text: Shaun Edward Byneveldt is a South African diplomat and politician who served as the South African Ambassador to Syria from 2010 to 2018. He was the Speaker of the Western Cape Provincial Parliament from 2004 to 2009. Byneveldt is a member of the African National Congress (ANC). ==References== Category:Living people Category:South African politicians Category:South African diplomats Category:Members of the Western Cape Provincial Parliament Category:African National Congress politicians Category:Cape Coloureds Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shaun Byneveldt
